name: Deep Cove Quarry Rock Adventure
description: Just 20 minutes from downtown Vancouver is Deep Cove, a beautiful waterfront community and the jewel of the North Shore. "The Cove" has a genuine small town feel and is a great place to spend the day, go for a walk, see a play or go for a meal. Recreational activities including hiking and kayaking define this quaint community. You will get the full Deep Cove experience when you join me on this tour which includes hotel pick up and drop off, a visit to Honey's doughnuts, doing the Quarry Rock hike and strolling the 2 block long main street. We might even be able to fit in a visit to the Deep Cove Brewery
